item.title: KDE ... NOW
item.description: Last week I got decently annoyed by having to lookup my flight information before FOSDEM. Also, you always forget when your flight is afterwards. Google started “Google Now” which aims to provide useful information about current events through your Android phone. But that does involve it going through your email. With that in mind, as a weekend project, I started to write a replacement. Initially, I started with just scrapping the information from the emails.
